=== my Linux history ===

I started with Linux in 1996 an for a lot of years, I am only a Linux User. 

** some tests with Slackware
** some tests with Caldera
** Desktop: SuSE 4.? to 7.3 (since SuSE 6.0 Linux only)
** Desktop: Mandrake (don't know wich version), Server: Debian Woody
** Desktop: Debian SID, Server: Debian Woody
** Desktop: Kubuntu since 5.04, Server: Debian Sarge + Etch

=== my Kubuntu and Kubuntu-de.org work ===

I work for Kubuntu, especially Kubuntu Germany, since september 2005.

==== Kubuntu-de.org CC Member ====

** arbitrate when we have disputes in our Community
** take a look to be on the right path with our project

==== Server Team ====

* Admin for both servers
* sponsored the traffic for the package archive, planet, pastebin and more ...

*** members[at]kubuntu-de.org (our internal team mailinglist)

=== presented Kubuntu at german Events ===

My work at the Kubuntu-de.org Eventteam mostly consists planning planning the booth, rent the living quarters and present Kubuntu. I think it's an important work for Kubuntu because we can promote Kubuntu to show that Kubuntu is the finest KDE distrubtion and get more Kubuntu users.

=== My (K)Ubuntu visions ===

Kubuntu is a distribution, that includes the Debian stability, the fine Ubuntu hardwaresupport and the world's greatest desktop environment, KDE.

I'll work on Kubuntu to make it
** the best KDE based distribution in the world
** the distrubtion with the biggest pool of KDE Apps
** the perfect distribution for
**** beginners
**** professional users
**** corporate users

==== next steps ====

** become a Kubuntu Member
** have more time for packaging to become a MOTU
** give more speech at german events
